Player History
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/24/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $510,000 per year...
Injured on 8/27/1987 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Oakland to Los Angeles on 2/6/1988 (Going to LAD: P Darryl Kile, P Darrel Akerfelds, SS Jose Offerman. Going to OAK: P Bob Welch)...
Injured on 6/18/1988 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/26/1989 with a Fractured Knee, out for 6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 7/14/1989, off Dennis Rasmussen (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/14/1989, off Freddie Toliver (PHI)...
Injured on 7/27/1989 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/16/1990 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 3/11/1991 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Pittsburgh on 8/19/1991...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,078,571 through salary arbitration...
